description: Kugira isuku no kunywa amazi meza kandi asukuye ari ingenzi mu kurwanya impiswi.
title: Kugira isuku no kunywa amazi meza kandi asukuye ari ingenzi mu kurwanya impiswi.
content:
Kugira isuku no kunywa amazi meza kandi asukuye ari ingenzi mu kurwanya impiswi. Ni ngombwa kandi gukaraba intoki ukoresheje amazi meza n’isabune nyuma yo kwituma, guhanagura umwana witumye, mbere yo gute-gura amafunguro, konsa cyangwa kugaburira umwana mu rwego rwo kwirinda no kumurinda indwara ziterwa n’umwanda.

**Ubundi buryo bw’isuku bwo kwirinda impiswi:**

 - Ronga neza imbuto n’imboga ukoresheje amazi meza, cyane cyane iyo
   umwana wawe azirya ari mbisi.
 - Tegura kandi uteke neza amafunguro mbere yo kurya. Ibiryo byabitswe
   igihe kirekire bishobora kwirundwaho na za mikorobi zishobora na zo
   gutera impiswi. Nyuma y’amasaha abiri ibiryo bihiye ntibiba bikimeze
   neza keretse bikomeje gushyuha cyane cyangwa se bigakonjeshwa.
 - Taba, twika cyangwa se ujugunye kure ibiryo byose byatakaye hasi
   kugirango amasazi abizengurukaho adakwirakwiza indwara.
